Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Harrison/Jefferson
ShortDescription: Eastbound 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Halsted, Monroe and Canal due to, street blockage near Harrison/Jefferson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Halsted, Monroe and Canal due to, street blockage near Harrison/Jefferson.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
